prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, Piano, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, and Piano, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Bass, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, and Piano, omitting Brass.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Bass, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, Piano, excluding Brass.
